attributes.action: Stop speeding through Hillmorton Rugby install cameras
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned need the department of transport to urgently review the impact of the expansion of DIRFT on the amount of traffic speeding through our village.
We urge the erection of speed cameras to prevent the cars who speed at 50 miles an hour plus down High Street and the Crick Road.
They are a danger to the residents who live along these roads.  Our quality if life and safety are being compromised for the sake of profit and expansion of the warehouses.  We have a right to be safe in our community.
